item.title: EPA Targets Obama-Era Rules That Let Climate Zealots Hold America Hostage
item.description: The Endangerment Finding will be reconsidered, a move that will shake the very foundation of the climate change movement.

item.title: Exclusive: Linda McMahon Meets With Detransitioners To Discuss Schools Pushing Gender Transition
item.description: Education and HHS are looking at ways they can stop the school-to-transition pipeline among children.

item.title: Ferris Bueller Never Would Have Made It Past Today’s Obsessive Location Sharing
item.description: The world shouldn’t be a panopticon, especially since the last time I checked, this is still America.
